title: "A Real Challenger" mission

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Got a problem with the mission A Real Challenger. Completed all my missions but still not completed it.
I even bought Worlds Master Pass and completed those.
Any idea what is wrong?
Thanks. :)
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: Everyone will be at 3/4 until Week 2 of missions starts.  Some players got 4/4, but that was due to a bug.  Sorry for the confusion!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=O3MN0ErR,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-28T16:55:05.470+0000)
>
> Everyone will be at 3/4 until Week 2 of missions starts.  Some players got 4/4, but that was due to a bug.  Sorry for the confusion!

And when will that be? We have no timeframes to work with here other then when missions were released last week...in which case, we are 30 minutes past new missions.
Can't make a guarantee  because I don't totally know for sure myself, but I'm assuming October 2nd around noon.  I don't want to set expectations, but there it is.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=O3MN0ErR,comment-id=000000020000,timestamp=2017-09-28T18:32:17.013+0000)
>
> Can't make a guarantee  because I don't totally know for sure myself, but I'm assuming October 2nd around noon.  I don't want to set expectations, but there it is.

Thank you! <3 {{sticker:sg-soraka}}
I kinda am annoyed over this RiotTv way of doing missions /sigh.    just lemme do all missions at one go, and enjoy worlds.
October 2nd??? and here I am logging into the client everyday, hoping for a mission to pop up. Bought the master pass as well. damn. {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
I'm at 1/6 for Legendary Pursuit... Did I get access to missions early or something?
will we have to rebuy the worlds pass every week then to get the 2 extra missions or is it a 1 time buy and gives you extra missions every week? i was just about to post about this same problem.
Just the one!  You'll get more missions with each week aligned with Worlds!
will all the missions be able to be done solo without teams at all?

all missions can be found here 

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/esports/esports-editorial/worlds-2017-missions-loot

but TOO LONG DONT READ VERSION : 

All of them are solo.
